field_subtitle: Allow webpages to be viewed in response to the size of the screen
field_desc: YES to Allow the responsive design features. If left unchecked then the fixed layout is used.
field_hint: {"title":"Responsive Design","content":"Allow webpages to be viewed in response to the size of the screen"}

field_title: Use Fixed Layout for iPad Portrait
field_subtitle: Allow Fixed Layout to be viewed in iPad Portrait
field_desc: YES to Allow the fixed layout for the iPad in portrait view.
field_hint: {"title":"Use Fixed Layout for iPad Portrait","content":"Allow Fixed Layout to be viewed in iPad Portrait"}

field_desc: YES to Enable pinch to zoom on mobile devices.
field_hint: {"title":"Enable Zoom on mobile devices","content":"Enable Zoom on mobile devices"}

field_desc: In px or %, eg: 100% or 1170px. Default value is 1170px.

field_hint: {"title":"Page Layout","content":"Number of Sidebars to be shown in the Page Layout."}

field_raw:
Sidebar Width

These settings are used on pages with 1 sidebar.

field_subtitle: Controls the width of the sidebar.
field_hint: {"title":"Sidebar Width","content":"Controls the width of the sidebar."}
